title: Chinese government donates anti-epidemic supplies to Kenya OAFLAD in July 2020
description: On July 22, 2020, the First Lady of China, Peng Liyuan, donated a batch of anti-epidemic supplies on behalf of the Chinese government to Kenya. The aid was organized by the Organization of African First Ladies for Development, or OAFLAD, which is turning its attention to aiding mothers and children in the battle against COVID-19. The donation was received in support of Kenyan first lady Margaret Kenyatta's Beyond Zero initiative at the organization's headquarters in Nairobi. The monetary value of the donation is unknown.
combined_text:
# Sector
HEALTH

# Title
Chinese government donates anti-epidemic supplies to Kenya OAFLAD in July 2020

# Description
On July 22, 2020, the First Lady of China, Peng Liyuan, donated a batch of anti-epidemic supplies on behalf of the Chinese government to Kenya. The aid was organized by the Organization of African First Ladies for Development, or OAFLAD, which is turning its attention to aiding mothers and children in the battle against COVID-19. The donation was received in support of Kenyan first lady Margaret Kenyatta's Beyond Zero initiative at the organization's headquarters in Nairobi. The monetary value of the donation is unknown.
